data.title: Kay Kay Menon: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Kay Kay Menon: Check out the list of all Kay Kay Menon movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Kay Kay Menon news on Times of India.
data.text:
We turned Farzi‚Äôs script on its head: Kay Kay Menon - Exclusive

etimes.in / Aug 12, 2024, 15:43 (IST)

Kay Kay Menon, renowned for his versatile acting, revealed that the script for Farzi underwent significant changes before its OTT release, transforming his villainous role into something more engaging. He also hinted at showcasing more of his humorous side in the upcoming detective series Shekhar Home, inspired by Sherlock Holmes.

Kay Kay Menon reveals he doesn‚Äôt have the potential to act like a ‚Äòstar‚Äô; says, 'Pointless for me to try'

etimes.in / Aug 11, 2024, 17:53 (IST)

Actor Kay Kay Menon, who is gearing up for the release of the web series 'Shekhar Home', reveals how he chose acting over being a star.

Kay Kay Menon recalls losing out on 'Maqbool' to dear friend Irrfan, but got 'Haider' as Manoj Bajpayee didn't have dates: 'Industry didn't know how to utilise us'

etimes.in / Aug 10, 2024, 12:27 (IST)

Kay Kay Menon, known for his powerful and versatile performances, is approaching an impressive milestone of three decades in the film industry.

Samantha Ruth Prabhu's trainer lauds her determination during ‚ÄòCitadel: Honey Bunny‚Äô filming: "You've won it all"

etimes.in / Aug 09, 2024, 13:50 (IST)

Samantha's fitness trainer, Junaid Shaikh, recently shared a candid post on Instagram, appreciating the actress for her unwavering commitment to the role. He recounted the numerous challenges Samantha faced, including getting injured and suffering from concussions, during the filming process. Despite these setbacks, Samantha refused to give up and pushed through, determined to deliver her best performance.

Kay Kay Menon reveals he felt Rabindranath Tagore‚Äôs presence when he visited Shantiniketan

etimes.in / Aug 08, 2024, 23:53 (IST)

Kay Kay Menon discussed his experiences filming the detective drama 'Shekhar Home' in West Bengal, particularly mentioning the presence of Rabindranath Tagore in Shantiniketan.

Samantha Ruth Prabhu charges THIS MUCH for 'Citadel: Honey Bunny': reports

etimes.in / Aug 08, 2024, 09:46 (IST)

Samantha Ruth Prabhu, a top actress, gears up for 'Citadel: Honey Bunny,' directed by Raj & DK. Premiering November 7 on Prime Video, this spy thriller sees Samantha in an action-packed role, commanding a hefty Rs 10 crore. The Indian adaptation of the English 'Citadel,' it also stars Kay Kay Menon, Simran, and more.

Srijit Mukherji releases the trailer for new detective drama starring Kay Kay Menon

TNN / Aug 03, 2024, 16:44 (IST)

Srijit Mukherjee developed a new mystery web series featuring Kay Kay Menon as Shekhar Home, an interpretation of Sherlock Holmes. The series, inspired by Arthur Conan Doyle's works, explored old Kolkata and Bengal's rural areas, showcasing Menon in a traditional Bengali attire. The cast included Ranvir Shorey, Rasika Dugal, Kirti Kulhari, and Dibyendu Bhattacharya.

It is unfortunate that I met with an accident when we are expecting our first child in September: Tanuj Virwani

TNN / Aug 03, 2024, 16:23 (IST)

Tanuj Virwani shares how he met with an accident recently and it will take him a month or more to recover.

Kay Kay Menon turns Shekhar Home for Srijit Mukherji‚Äôs next; Trailer out now

etimes.in / Aug 02, 2024, 19:41 (IST)

Director Srijit Mukherji, known for his work with detectives like Feluda and Byomkesh Bakshi, has taken on Sherlock Holmes with the film 'Shekhar Home'. Kay Kay Menon stars as the titular character. The film is set in Old Kolkata and releases on a streaming platform on August 14. Ravir Shorey plays Dr. John Watson.

Citadel Honey-Bunny: Samantha Ruth Prabhu and Varun Dhawan's pan India chemistry shines in new pics

etimes.in / Aug 02, 2024, 12:48 (IST)

Varun Dhawan took to Instagram to share his gratitude towards fans for their enthusiastic support. He posted a series of charming photos with Samantha, emphasizing their chemistry, he humourously captioned "North boy + South girl = pan INDIA chemistry," showcasing the blend of their backgrounds and talents. Samantha was quick to react, commenting, ‚ÄúYeah baby üî•,‚Äù showcasing her enthusiasm for the moment.

Kay Kay Menon-starrer series 'Shekhar Home' on August 14

PTI / Aug 01, 2024, 14:45 (IST)

The detective drama series 'Shekhar Home,' starring Kay Kay Menon, Ranvir Shorey, Rasika Dugal, and Kirti Kulhari, premiered on August 14. Directed by Rohan Sippy and Srijit Mukherjee, the show draws inspiration from Arthur Conan Doyle's works. Set in the 1990s, it explores human nature through the adventures of detective Shekhar Home and his allies.

Kay Kay Menon turns Shekhar Home for Srijit Mukherji‚Äôs next; First look out now

etimes.in / Jul 28, 2024, 13:02 (IST)

Srijit Mukherji directed a new detective series inspired by Sherlock Holmes, starring Kay Kay Menon as Shekhar Home. The first look and motion poster have been released, showing Menon evoking Sherlock's classic image. Ravir Shorey is expected to play Dr. Watson. The series will feature actors Rasika Dugal, Kirti Kulhari, and Dibyendu Bhattacharya in important roles.

After a chat mangni pat byaah in December, Tanya and I look forward to becoming parents now: Tanuj Virwani

TNN / Jul 13, 2024, 14:58 (IST)

Tanuj Virwani shares his happiness as he will soon become a father. His wife Tanya is expecting a baby and the baby is due in September.

Aanand L. Rai opens up on how he chose Ansh Duggal, Pragati Srivastava as leads in 'Nakhrewaalii'

IANS / Jul 06, 2024, 14:06 (IST)

Filmmaker Aanand L. Rai, who is gearing up to launch fresh faces Ansh Duggal and Pragati Srivastava in his upcoming film 'Nakhrewaalii', revealed how he discovered the two talents for the movie, which promises to bring a fresh perspective to Bollywood rom-coms. Directed by Rahul Shanklya and written by Divy Nidhi Sharma, 'Nakhrewaalii' is produced by Jyoti Deshpande, Aanand L Rai, and Himanshu Sharma.

Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover go for a holiday with daughter Devi

etimes.in / Jun 29, 2024, 14:51 (IST)

Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover are on a vacation in Maharashtra with their daughter Devi and family. Bipasha shared Instagram stories showcasing their holiday, including sweet moments with Devi. The couple, who met on the set of Alone and married in 2016, welcomed Devi in 2022. Karan will last seen in Hrithik Roshan starrer Fighter.

When Babil Khan opened up about his heartwarming first encounter with Shah Rukh Khan on 'Billu Barber' sets

etimes.in / Jun 01, 2024, 10:00 (IST)

Babil Khan, 25, shares a heartwarming memory of meeting Shah Rukh Khan on the 'Billu Barber' sets and discusses his preference for solitude despite his film background

Manoj Bajpayee calls THESE actors Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma of Bollywood, here's why

etimes.in / May 24, 2024, 15:40 (IST)

Manoj Bajpayee thinks that actors like Irrfan Khan, Kay Kay Menon, Nawazuddin Siddiqui are like the Gavaskar of acting. Here are some actors who he referred to as the Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma of Bollywood!

Amidst his post with a mystery girl, Babil Khan recalls blowing up his date recently; says the girl didn't want to see him again

etimes.in / May 15, 2024, 18:46 (IST)

Actor Babil Khan discussed a recent date's challenges amid fame, reflecting on sacrifices in the industry. He described himself as an "introverted extrovert," expressing concerns about maintaining genuine connections amidst growing attention. Khan emphasized the importance of preserving authenticity despite increasing fame. He's currently filming for 'The Umesh Chronicles' with Amitabh Bachchan.

Babil Khan accidentally photobombs a woman and instantly apologises for unintentionally obstructing her view; Netizens react

etimes.in / May 09, 2024, 17:22 (IST)

Babil Khan, son of late Irrfan Khan, continues to captivate fans with his acting prowess. Recently, his appearance at an event drew attention when a heartwarming moment was captured and quickly went viral on social media. During the event, Babil engaged with photographers, inadvertently blocking a woman's view in the designated picture booth. Upon realizing his mistake, he promptly covered his face in embarrassment and apologized sincerely.

Riteish Deshmukh and Genelia Deshmukh's funny video delights Juhi Chawla

etimes.in / May 05, 2024, 12:17 (IST)

Bollywood's beloved couple, Riteish Deshmukh and Genelia Deshmukh, keep fans entertained with their acting and humorous Instagram reels, reflecting their real-life chemistry. Their recent video, posted by Genelia, features Riteish dancing to Juhi Chawla‚Äôs 'Akela Hai Mr. Khiladi', with Genelia playfully changing the tune to 'Biwi No.1', sparking a fun challenge. Juhi Chawla, amused by the video, responded with a laughing emoji, drawing an affectionate 'Aww' from Genelia. Other celebrities like Hansika Motwani, Mushtaq Shiekh, and Jay Bhanushali also joined in with their comments.
